QuestData.Title: Warchief's Command: Zul'Drak!
QuestData.Description:
All able-bodied members of the Horde are hereby ordered to report to Crusader Lord Lantinga in Zul'Drak.
The Scourge is massacring the local population in Zul'Drak and converting them over to be part of the Scourge army.
Assist the Argent Crusade and the Ebon Blade in stopping this threat.
For the Horde!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Crusader Lord Lantinga in Zul'Drak.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Crusader Lord Lantinga in Zul'Drak.
QuestData.RewardText:
Death and acts of sacrilege pervert this land.
<Lantinga lets out a drawn-out sigh.>
Thankfully, we're here to stop it.
